::Zardus::

Zardus glances down at his wrist comp, quickly checking on what they might need.

"Perhaps a manually controlled turret on the repair station would be good. If we find a body, we can build a bot as well. But we'll see what we find. Let's go."

He walks out of the room, motioning for the two to follow him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Hurricane/Wheeljack:::
> 
> Hurricane: A new bot sounds good. We need as much firepower as we can get.
> Wheeljack: Well, if we do make an expansion to the repair system, what would 
> it be?
